original_solution_mapping.L3: Half of his age was 30/2=<<30/2=15>>15 years old

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6186.
    Returns: Jim's age in 2 years.
    """
    # L1
    tom_age_five_years_ago = 32 # Tom turned 32 years old 5 years ago
    years_since_then = 5 # 5 years ago
    tom_current_age = tom_age_five_years_ago + years_since_then

    # L2
    years_ago_jim_was_older = 7 # 7 years ago Jim was 5 years older
    tom_age_seven_years_ago = tom_current_age - years_ago_jim_was_older

    # L3
    half_divisor = 2 # half Tom's age
    half_tom_age_seven_years_ago = tom_age_seven_years_ago / half_divisor

    # L4
    jim_older_than_half_tom_age = 5 # 5 years older than half Tom's age
    jim_age_seven_years_ago = half_tom_age_seven_years_ago + jim_older_than_half_tom_age

    # L5
    jim_current_age = jim_age_seven_years_ago + years_ago_jim_was_older

    # L6
    years_in_future = 2 # in 2 years
    jim_age_in_two_years = jim_current_age + years_in_future

    # FA
    answer = jim_age_in_two_years
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: So {years_ago_jim_was_older} years ago he was {tom_current_age}-{years_ago_jim_was_older}=<<{tom_current_age}-{years_ago_jim_was_older}={tom_age_seven_years_ago}>>{tom_age_seven_years_ago} years old
Half of his age was {tom_age_seven_years_ago}/{half_divisor}=<<{tom_age_seven_years_ago}/{half_divisor}={half_tom_age_seven_years_ago}>>{half_tom_age_seven_years_ago} years old
So he is now {jim_age_seven_years_ago}+{years_ago_jim_was_older}=<<{jim_age_seven_years_ago}+{years_ago_jim_was_older}={jim_current_age}>>{jim_current_age} years old
That means in {years_in_future} years he will be {jim_current_age}+{years_in_future}=<<{jim_current_age}+{years_in_future}={jim_age_in_two_years}>>{jim_age_in_two_years} years old
